data.message:
Try fixing what's wrong first!!!!
OK Facebook
What's your problem now???? 
I pick up my phone first thing in the am and when I get on fb, I drag down to update the page and what shows up?? Posts from 3 days ago that I never saw nor were there any notifications to which I chose to receive!!!!
Please get off the controll train and let me see what I want instead of what you think I should see!!!!
PLEASE!!!???!!!! Ughhhh

replies.message: Hey Sheryl. Thanks for sharing this feedback with us. Please visit our Help Center for tips on controlling what you see in News Feed: http://on.fb.me/1U80aSh. Thanks again for reaching out. -Anna

I've already done that. Thank you.  All I want is to see what my friends post and I will decide if it's something I want to see! This is also not the first time both of these things have happened. It seems to recur every once in a while after you have done an update!
